description: Monitors the specified directory for images and attempts to extract flake geometry from them. If configured correctly, this program will also delete images that don't contain any flakes in order to save disk space.

spec.help: The directory containing the images to process.
The number of concurrent processes to use when processing files. This program uses a process pool to delegate work to multiple cores and/or processors.
The maximum number of layers to include in the final database generated by this code.
